thread.title: How to Get Carolyn Bessette Kennedy’s Radically Simple Style

author: RORY SATRAN
title: How to Get Carolyn Bessette Kennedy’s Radically Simple Style
text:
IN A COUP for accessible style, Sharon Stone wore a simple Gap turtleneck under her chic black velvet coat to the 1996 Oscars. As a fashion-curious middle-schooler, I was riveted: Here was something fabulous-looking I could buy with my baby-sitting dollars and wear to the local Starbucks. With her spur-of-the-moment turtleneck, Ms. Stone went a long way to democratizing the stark minimalism that designers like Calvin Klein and Helmut Lang were sanctifying in the ’90s.
Three years later, I found an even better style role model....
